name: Bean Jumper (Hen games)
description:
Demo

Welcome to Bean Jumper! In this game, the objective is to climb up to the heli in order to escape. You can choose between maps, chapters and game modes that fits  your style!

Here are the game modes:

Lava - You got a couple seconds until the lava starts to rise and eventually to kill you!

Timer - You are on a timer, this may be easier but be careful!

Here are the chapters:

City Dump 

Vast Desert

This is a demo and does not represent the final quality of the game!

 The game will contain more chapters, maps, game modes and eventually a multiplayer version.
